message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you get $40. A fair offer to start.
Let's meet in the middle, 55 for me, 45 for you.
I understand you want to meet in the middle, but I proposed it first.  Let's be fair, I'll take $55, you get $45.
Getting closer! I'll take 52, you get 48. Time to agree?
Okay, let's split the difference. I'll take $51, you take $49.  We need to agree before inflation eats away at this deal!
